item.title: 交易商 IXM 称电动汽车对铜的需求保持不变
item.description: 大宗商品贸易商 IXM 的精炼金属主管表示，尽管电动汽车销售放缓引发了疑虑，但对电动汽车所用铜等金属的需求上升趋势依然完好，但由于市场在不断变化，因此很难估计数字。【原文：The uptrend in demand for metals such as copper used in electric vehicles is intact despite doubts raised by the slowdown in EV sales, but estimating numbers is difficult as the market is evolving, commodity trader IXM's head of refined metal said.】

item.title: CAMP4 Therapeutics 在美国首次公开募股中寻求最高 2.83 亿美元的估值
item.description: 由医疗保健巨头凯撒医疗集团（Kaiser Permanente）支持的生物制药公司CAMP4 Therapeutics周一表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值高达2.83亿美元。【原文：CAMP4 Therapeutics, a biopharmaceutical company backed by healthcare giant Kaiser Permanente, said on Monday it was targeting a valuation of up to $283 million in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 早间竞价巨额薪资令 10 年期国债收益率突破 4
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 华尔街期货下滑，市场在繁忙的一周前重新评估利率走势
item.description: 美国股指期货周一下滑，原因是在关键的通胀数据、政策制定者的言论以及本周晚些时候开始的第三季度财报季到来之前，投资者减少了对美联储今年降息幅度的押注。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Monday as investors dialed back bets on the scope of the Federal Reserve rate cuts this year, ahead of key inflation data, policymakers' comments and the third-quarter earnings season that starts later this week.】

item.title: Equinor 收购 Orsted 9.8% 股份，价值 25 亿美元
item.description: 挪威 Equinor 公司周一表示，已收购丹麦可再生能源集团 Orsted 9.8% 的股份，价值约 25 亿美元，成为仅次于丹麦政府的第二大股东。【原文：Norway's Equinor said on Monday it has bought a 9.8% stake in Danish renewable energy group Orsted valued at around $2.5 billion, making it the second largest shareholder after the government of Denmark.】

item.title: 高盛上调标普 500 指数年底及未来 12 个月的目标值
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）上调了基准 S&P 500 指数在今年年底和未来 12 个月的目标值，原因是预期企业公司的利润率会有更高的增长，而且到 2025 年宏观经济前景稳定。【原文：Goldman Sachs has raised its target for the benchmark S&P 500 index for the year-end and the next 12 months on expectations of higher margin growth for corporate companies and a steady macroeconomic outlook through 2025.】

item.title: 独家报道三星电子称无意分拆代工业务
item.description: 三星电子董事长李在镕（Jay Y. Lee）周一告诉路透社，三星电子无意分拆其合约芯片制造业务和逻辑芯片设计业务。【原文：Samsung Electronics is not interested in spinning off its contract chip manufacturing business as well as its logic chip designing operation, its chairperson Jay Y. Lee told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 雪佛龙将向加拿大自然资源公司剥离价值 65 亿美元的资产
item.description: 雪佛龙周一表示，将以 65 亿美元的价格向加拿大自然资源公司（Canadian Natural Resources）出售其在阿萨巴斯卡油砂项目（Athabasca Oil Sands project）中的非经营性权益和在杜弗奈页岩项目（Duvernay shale）中的经营性权益，这两个项目均位于加拿大阿尔伯塔省。【原文：Chevron said on Monday it would sell its non-operated interest in the Athabasca Oil Sands project and its operated interest in Duvernay shale, all located in Alberta, Canada, to Canadian Natural Resources for $6.5 billion.】

item.title: 加纳野猫式金矿开采蓬勃发展，毒害人类和自然
item.description: 在加纳的一个无证金矿，身着 T 恤、短裤和胶靴的男子蹚过一滩滩掺杂着水银的泥水，徒手掏出石头，操作摇摇晃晃的水闸，寻找珍贵的矿石。【原文：At an unlicensed gold mine in Ghana, men in t-shirts, shorts and rubber boots wade through pools of muddy water laced with mercury, pull out rocks with bare hands and operate a rickety sluice as they search for the precious ore.】

item.title: 就业报告好于预期，高盛将美国经济衰退概率降至 15
item.description: 在最新的就业报告显示数据好于预期之后，高盛（Goldman Sachs）将美国在未来 12 个月内陷入衰退的几率下调了 5 个百分点，降至 15%。【原文：Goldman Sachs has lowered the odds of the United States slipping into a recession in the next 12 months by five percentage points to 15%, following the latest employment report that showed better-than-expected data.】

item.title: 壳牌第三季度炼油利润率大幅下降
item.description: 壳牌石油公司周一表示，第三季度炼油利润率比前三个月大幅下降，石油产品贸易收益也有所下降。【原文：Shell's refining profit margins dropped sharply in the third quarter from the previous three months, while oil product trading earnings also weakened, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 东京地铁希望在 2018 年以来日本最大的 IPO 中筹集高达 24 亿美元的资金
item.description: 东京地铁公司周一提交的一份监管文件显示，该公司已将首次公开发行股票的价格区间定为每股 1100 至 1200 日元，而最初预计的价格区间为 1100 日元。【原文：Tokyo Metro has set a price range for an initial public at 1,100 to 1,200 yen per share, against an initial estimate of 1,100 yen, a regulatory filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯审查绿色钢铁生产计划
item.description: 有报道称，蒂森克虏伯正在考虑停止一个价值 30 亿欧元（33 亿美元）的去碳化项目，对此，这家德国企业集团周日晚些时候表示，正在审查绿色钢铁的生产计划。【原文：Thyssenkrupp is reviewing plans for production of green steel, the German conglomerate said late on Sunday, responding to a report that it was considering halting a 3-billion-euro ($3.3 billion) decarbonisation project.】

item.title: 独家报道：英国石油公司在战略重启中降低石油产量目标
item.description: 这家在伦敦上市的公司目前正瞄准中东和墨西哥湾的几项新投资，以提高其石油和天然气产量。【原文：The London-listed company is now targeting several new investments in the Middle East and the Gulf of Mexico to boost its oil and gas output.】

item.title: 美国就业数据强劲后的利率反思如何撼动市场
item.description: 如果强于预期的经济增长促使投资者彻底改变对美联储未来几个月需要削减多少借贷成本的看法，那么美国就业数据的爆炸性反响可能会威胁到以利率下降为前提的各种交易。【原文：The reverberations from a blowout U.S. employment number could threaten an assortment of trades predicated on falling interest rates, if stronger-than-expected growth spurs investors to radically shift views on how much the Federal Reserve will need to cut borrowing costs in the months ahead.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美国 "不着陆 "情景提振市场
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 中国 9 月黄金储备连续第五个月保持不变
item.description: 周一的官方数据显示，中国央行 9 月份连续第五个月没有购买黄金作为储备，主要原因是黄金价格飙升。【原文：China's central bank held back on buying gold for its reserves for a fifth straight month in September, official data showed on Monday, mainly due to a surge in prices for the yellow metal.】

item.title: 日本引领亚洲股市反弹，美元在美国非农就业数据公布后上涨
item.description: 周一，在井喷式的美国劳动力数据消除了市场对经济衰退的担忧并促使降息押注大幅减少之后，亚洲股市反弹，美元兑日元汇率创下七周来的新高。【原文：Asian stocks rallied and the dollar reached a fresh seven-week peak on the yen on Monday after blowout U.S. labour data dispelled fears of a recession and spurred a sharp paring of rate-cut bets.】

item.title: 在经历了一年多来最强劲的单周涨幅后，原油涨幅有所收窄
item.description: 由于中东地区爆发战争的威胁日益加剧，油价在上周五创下一年多来的最大单周涨幅后，周一早盘收敛涨幅。【原文：Oil prices pared gains in early trade on Monday after charting their biggest weekly rise in over a year on Friday amid mounting threats of a region-wide war in the Middle East.】

item.title: 日元下跌，日本最高外汇外交官警告防范投机行为
item.description: 日本最高货币外交官三村敦史（Atsushi Mimura）周一发出警告，在日元汇率跌破 1 美元兑 149 日元的时候，不要在外汇市场上进行投机活动。【原文：Japan's top currency diplomat, Atsushi Mimura, issued on Monday a warning against speculative moves on the foreign exchange market as the yen fell below 149 per dollar.】

item.title: 美国就业数据和中东局势爆发后，美元一路走高
item.description: 日元跌至近两个月来的最低点，其他主要货币也在周一早盘遭遇损失，因为美元延续了上周五强劲的美国就业数据和中东冲突升级所引发的涨势。【原文：Japan's yen fell to its lowest in nearly two months and other major currencies too were grappling with losses early on Monday as the dollar extended a rally sparked by Friday's strong U.S. jobs data and an escalation in the Middle East conflict.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者 Starboard Value 以 10 亿美元入股辉瑞公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，激进投资者 Starboard Value 已持有辉瑞约 10 亿美元的股份，并希望这家美国制药巨头做出改变，扭转业绩。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value has taken a roughly $1 billion stake in Pfizer and wants the U.S. drug giant to make changes to turn its performance around, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 三星第三季度利润复苏乏力
item.description: 该公司在人工智能热潮中迟迟未能兑现承诺。【原文：The company has been slow to cash in on the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: REC 调查显示，英国薪资增长为 2021 年 2 月以来最弱
item.description: 一项调查显示，9 月份英国就业市场出现更多降温迹象，薪资增长速度为近四年来最慢，这可能会让英国央行在考虑是否再次削减借贷成本时感到放心。【原文：Britain's jobs market showed more signs of cooling in September as pay growth increased at the slowest pace in almost four years, according to a survey likely to reassure the Bank of England as it considers whether to cut borrowing costs again.】

item.title: 欧洲央行可能在 10 月份降息，原因是通胀率过低：维勒鲁瓦
item.description: 法国中央银行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）对意大利一家报纸说，欧洲中央银行可能将于10月17日降息，因为经济增长疲软，这增加了通胀率低于2%目标的风险。【原文：The European Central Bank will probably cut interest rates on Oct 17 as economic growth is weak and this raises the risk that inflation will undershoot its 2% target, French Central Bank Chief Francois Villeroy de Galhau told an Italian newspaper.】

item.title: 锂矿商 Arcadium 确认力拓收购意向
item.description: 交易达成后，里约将成为电动汽车电池金属的第三大生产商。【原文：A deal would make Rio the third-largest producer of the electric-vehicle battery metal.】

item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局批准 SpaceX 猎鹰 9 号飞行器于 10 月 7 日进行飞行
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周日表示，SpaceX公司的猎鹰9号运载火箭（Falcon 9 vehicle）已获准返航，执行计划于10月7日从佛罗里达州的一个发射站发射的任务。【原文：The SpaceX Falcon 9 vehicle is authorized to return to flight for a planned mission scheduled to launch on Oct. 7 from a station in Florida, the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said on Sunday.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官：应允许中国汽车制造商通过在欧盟投资规避关税
item.description: 在德国及其汽车制造商拒绝对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税后，欧盟仍将继续对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税。【原文：The EU will press ahead with tariffs on China-made electric vehicles, even after Germany and its carmakers rejected them.】

item.title: 谷歌、Wayve 和布鲁克菲尔德将出席英国投资峰会
item.description: 英国政府周六表示，英国新政府的首次国际投资峰会将邀请来自谷歌、Wayve 和布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）等公司的高级管理人员参加。【原文：The new British government's first international investment summit will feature senior executives from companies including Google , Wayve and Brookfield Asset Management, the government said on Saturday.】
